sections.text: Grant the Superintendent or any other District agency jurisdiction over a federal association or any merger or consolidation of a federal association in which an association chartered by the District is not a party; or
Subject any federal association to any law or rule of the District or its agencies to which it is not otherwise subject.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)
